name: Sigurd
desc: A valiant warrior who resisted the dark calamity in ancient days. Though his life's spark has been extinguished, his unbending will has yet to fade, and those who swore to become hunters of the Wild Hunt continue his endless battle even today. The dark abyss's corrosion has seeped into his marrow, causing him to lose his way, but the desire to defend hearth and home will surely reignite, reawakening him to continue a bitter, eternal battle.

value.name: The Bell of Mourning Echoes
value.desc: A warrior who walks the abyss seeks to carry out an as-yet unfulfilled oath...

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Mistshroud Manifestation
dropMaterial.desc:
A chunk found in the mists of the Wild Hunt.
Like a snowflake forming from the air, it was created by the manifestation and solidification of dark power from another world.

dropMaterial.name: Mistshroud Plate
dropMaterial.desc:
A plate found in the mists of the Wild Hunt.
It was part of the armor of a Wild Hunt monster, but for some reason, it did not disappear with the mist.

dropMaterial.name: Mistshroud Helmet
dropMaterial.desc:
A helmet found in the mists of the Wild Hunt.
Perhaps because the sullying presence from beyond this world has fed from the memories of the Ley Lines, its shape appears oddly similar to the relics of a lost kingdom.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mistshroud Helmet
customize.desc:
A helmet found in the mists of the Wild Hunt.
Perhaps because the sullying presence from beyond this world has fed from the memories of the Ley Lines, its shape appears oddly similar to the relics of a lost kingdom.

customize.text: Avoid getting hit by Sigurd's "Demonsbane Strike."

customize.text:
Eliminate all lured Wilderness Exiles before Sigurd can act.
<color=#ffd780>World Level must reach 9</color>

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Afterglow of Long Night Flint
customize.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Lighting a lamp can dispel darkness, and so the people of the borderlands believed that as long as the lamps of the Lightkeepers were lit, the home of the living would be free of evil spirits.
The warriors who had sworn to watch over the night believed the same. That is why, like moths to a flame, man faced a mountain of evil clad in armor to protect his fragile flesh.
Until the black tide consumes his flesh, or his flesh devours the black tide, the two cannot be told apart.
